arts.ttl: Declan Rice comments on Arsenal mocking Erling Haaland as Mikel Arteta hails 'brave' duo
arts.sum: Arsenal smashed Manchester City at the Emirates Stadium on Sunday, Mikel Arteta's men romping to a 5-1 thrashing of Pep Guardiola's struggling champions who look a shadow of their former selves

arts.ttl: Gary Neville rips into 'disrespectful' Gabriel after Arsenal star laughed in Erling Haaland's face - and claims he felt 'uneasy' watching the celebration
arts.sum: Gary Neville labelled Arsenal defender Gabriel as 'disrespectful' after he was spotted laughing in the face of Manchester City striker Erling Haaland in Sunday's 5-1 win.

arts.ttl: Gary Neville questions why 'frustrating' Arsenal had to concede an equaliser against Man City before they upped their game and 'set the standard' for title race in 5-1 win
arts.sum: Gary Neville was impressed with Arsenal's rampant second half display against Manchester City but admitted he felt a sense of frustration with the fact it took an equaliser for them to start playing with real intent.

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher compares Arsenal's Myles Lewis-Skelly to three England stars after scoring his first Arsenal goal in 5-1 victory over Man City
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher heaped praise on Myles Lewis-Skelly after the 18-year-old scored his first Arsenal goal in their 5-1 in over Man City at the Emirates Stadium.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola lost for words over Myles Lewis-Skelly mocking Erling Haaland goal celebration
arts.sum: The Manchester City manager could say little more than two words when finding out

arts.ttl: Gary Neville Labels Arsenal Ace ‘Disrespectful’ For Actions During Win vs Man City
arts.sum: Arsenal have come under some fire for their over-the-top celebrations after a 5-1 win over Man City, but Neville believes one player took it too far.

arts.ttl: Smiling Man City striker Erling Haaland sends message to Arsenal fans after being trolled at the Emirates Stadium
arts.sum: Haaland had been targeted all afternoon, with Gunners fans and players seemingly still reeling from the 'stay humble' jibe he had aimed at Mikel Arteta following September's 2-2 draw at the Etihad.

arts.ttl: Thierry Henry says he doesn't know how Erling Haaland copes having so few touches as he pinpoints where the Man City striker needs to do more after Arsenal thrashing
arts.sum: Arsenal legend Thierry Henry said he wants to see more from Erling Haaland following Sunday's 5-1 thrashing at the hands of his former club.

arts.ttl: 5 ways Arsenal humbled Erling Haaland: From Lewis-Skelly celebration to X-rated chants
arts.sum: Manchester City were hammered by Arsenal at the Emirates Stadium and Erling Haaland's 'stay humble' comments from the reverse fixture have come back to bite him

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola PRAISES Arsenal star for mocking Erling Haaland - before telling 5-word comment
arts.sum: Arsenal's hammering of Manchester City was punctuated by frequent attempts from Arsenal to wind up Erling Haaland, with Pep Guardiola brushing off the mockery of his star striker
